entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 27 December 2022
